attributes.action: Provide a referendum on the adoption of measures to give greater democracy to the people of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prior to a general election give us a referendum on the following options to free the political system in this country from the control of political party officials and give our democracy back to the people by making those in power democratically accountable to us.

A constitution.

Prime-Ministerial elections – A directly elected leader ensures efforts are concentrated on serving the public not the party. 

A clear seperation of Legislative and Executive arms of government – Members of the Cabinet should not serve in Parliament as MPs.

Both houses to be directly elected – We should not be electing MPs to serve a party, or even a government; they should be elected to serve us, the people.  No Whips.

The only way to provide credibility to government is to radically overhaul the political system through immediate action.  Achieving such aims may seem difficult to those who work within the confines of the current system but to us the people it is not only essential it’s achievable and expected.
